page.title: 13LIFE LONG RESIDENT OF I.A.
page.content: Mrs Christon has lived in Ingleby A. all her life (57yrs). She says she likes living there because it is her home. Sha has lived in 4 different houses in the village. When she was a girl she went to the old school where there were no dinners and 2 classes squashed into a very small building. Four shops were in the village then and buses went frequently to Northallerton and Stokesley. Nowadays peoples cars have replaced the bus service. When she was first married she had no electricity or water in her house. She had to use the village pump. Mrs Christon works as a dinner lady at the school. Her two brothers own the local coach hire firm which is based in the village and was established by her grandfather in 1922.
